description: JSON enum for the state a WebhookVerification can be in.

enum.name: PENDING_VERIFICATION
enum.description: The Webhook has been created, but no verification code has been sent.

enum.name: VERIFICATION_CODE_SENT
enum.description: The Webhook has been created and a verification code has been sent.

enum.name: VERIFIED
enum.description: The Webhook has been created and verified succesfully.
